website_summaries.verdict: A good variety of masonry drill bits that includes a storage box.
pros: Features five carbide-tipped bits in sizes ranging from 3/16" to 1/2"
cons: The smallest bit tends to dull more quickly than the rest

customer_reviews.title: The smallest bit burnt out too quickly.
customer_reviews.text: these bits are amazing. however I have been having allot of trouble with the smallest size. I used it to drill about 12 holes into a brick wall without a problem. I went to use it again on the same wall about a week later and the bit burnt out on me in about 30 seconds. This is just the smallest bit in the pack. "The one I actually need." all of the others are cutting like butter.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Reed Photography

customer_reviews.title: Sharp and fast drilling
customer_reviews.text: I have used these mostly for ceramic and clay flower pots, but also brick and mortar and concert. The cut very fast IF you have a flow of water keeping the tip cool and hole washed out. They are much slower when used dry.. Assorted sizes in a nice case.
customer_reviews.author: Claggett's Bengals

customer_reviews.title: Worked for me
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this device for a discrete project - drilling two holes into my concrete ceiling to mount a projector - and it worked fine. Although it took a while to drill the holes, I was fine with this given how inexpensive the product is. I only used the drill for that one project and so I cannot comment on how it will hold up over time.
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: Drill bits are drill bits I guess.  The case is mighty handy.
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. Nice bright orange case, easy to find in my toolbox. The case also over sized w a clear plate on the other door, so you can put screwdriver bits in there screws and sheaths you're going to use or what ever else you need.
customer_reviews.author: BillyTheKid

customer_reviews.title: Great set for small jobs around the house
customer_reviews.text: This is a great starter set for jobs around the house (I needed it to hang a large canvas photo on my fireplace) but the reason for the 4 stars is the packaging came dirty with some weird black tar substance on it. But once I cut that off, it was fine.
customer_reviews.author: E Mel

customer_reviews.title: hefty drill bits in a hefty case
customer_reviews.text: is pretty much what you'd expect of black and decker. great quality and value for money!
customer_reviews.author: Roy

customer_reviews.title: Not very good for anything.
customer_reviews.text: I have had nothing but problems trying to use these bits, they are such poor quality the will not work with anything harder than grout.
customer_reviews.author: Nasty Jay

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Used it on ceramic pots perfectly! Great case too
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: These will get you through it.
customer_reviews.text: Now these are what i'd been needing for my plaster walls!
customer_reviews.author: matt walker

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Worked for the job I needed to do around the house.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny

customer_reviews.title: I like B&D tools
customer_reviews.text: I like B&D tools. I own many B&D tools and accessories. I needed a carbide tip masonry bit to drill a hole in a porcelain sink. It handled the job well. I recommend this if you need a masonry bit for household use.
customer_reviews.author: iAmElectric

customer_reviews.title: Bought these a while back, but didn't have a ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought these a while back, but didn't have a use for them until this past weekend. Drilled thought brick and mortar with much ease. Not much more to say other than these bits do the job.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Segari

customer_reviews.title: didn't work on tile
customer_reviews.text: bought these to drill a hole through bath tile to install shower rod but they didn't work. had to go to Lowe's to buy a diamond-tipped bit...
customer_reviews.author: TXMahaRaj

customer_reviews.title: He loved it and indeed useful around the house
customer_reviews.text: It was purchased as a gift for my son to use around the house. He loved it and indeed useful around the house.
customer_reviews.author: bulik53

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased.
customer_reviews.text: I was always losing my bits. I needed a set in a case. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: P. Allison

customer_reviews.title: Incredibly durable
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in great condition and have held-up after multiple uses.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin M

customer_reviews.title: They are good, but I was not able to drill through ...
customer_reviews.text: They are good, but I was not able to drill through the hard bathroom ceramic tile. I had to go a buy a special tile bit to get the job done,
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fine just another item for the tool box I ordered ...
customer_reviews.text: Fine just another item for the tool box I ordered the wrong thing for the machine I have they dont fit so now I'll have to get a drill to put them on. I had a power screw driver not a drill lol
customer_reviews.author: Shandell Hudson

customer_reviews.title: Good enough for me.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent set. Goes through masonry easily and without too much effort. used them a dozen times now and they still able to get through without damaging the tips
customer_reviews.author: David Edwards and Tina Edwards

customer_reviews.title: good price
customer_reviews.text: good price if you plan is for not to use in heavy tasks
customer_reviews.author: martin

customer_reviews.title: Cement Bits
customer_reviews.text: The case these bits come in is superb but the bits are... well... they could hardly penetrate wood, lol. The case is worth five bucks perhaps and I "will" attempt to use them on cement but... let's keep our fingers crossed.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Tice

customer_reviews.title: Great bits for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great masonry bits for the price with a convenient carrying case.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Useful tool for 25 year old concrete
customer_reviews.text: They work great with a hammer drill. They do not work with any other type drill...tried it. B&D has an inexpensive hammer drill that really does the job!
customer_reviews.author: vick

customer_reviews.title: it's great for hanging things on concrete walls or brick
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I use these all the time; it's great for hanging things on concrete walls or brick.
customer_reviews.author: Clarissa Westenburger

customer_reviews.title: I would highly recommend this.
customer_reviews.text: Well made set of masonry drill bits and handy case it comes in, which helps me keep things in place! I would highly recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Leo

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Work well. Seem to be high quality. Went through tile and concrete without an issue.
customer_reviews.author: Carl Rogers

customer_reviews.title: So far these drill bits have worked out well. ...
customer_reviews.text: So far these drill bits have worked out well. I wish there were a couple more sizes included but it is as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Great set of masonry drill bits
customer_reviews.text: Great set of masonry drill bits...handy for jobs that drilling through concrete or other surfaces. Works perfectly with my DeWalt drill and I appreciate the handy storage case.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Black & decker masonry drill bits
customer_reviews.text: These drill bits work fantastic when used with hammer drill. They cut through concrete with amazing speed You won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Color make it easy to find in tool bag
customer_reviews.text: Well designed storage box. Color make it easy to find in tool bag.
customer_reviews.author: Tex

customer_reviews.title: Nice job!
customer_reviews.text: On time, well packaged and a receipt was included. Nice job!
customer_reviews.author: Jay- Oh

customer_reviews.title: As you'd expect from Black & Decker.
customer_reviews.text: Nice box hold the bits, and has a section for small parts like screws, anchors, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Mickeydid

customer_reviews.title: These drill heads are awesome, I have a B&D hand drill and dry ...
customer_reviews.text: These drill heads are awesome, I have a B&D hand drill and dry wall in my apartment which worked great. But my sister has brick walls in hers, I was able to help her out with these drill heads.
customer_reviews.author: Nikhil

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Too lightweight for the thick (1 inch) pots in my yard
customer_reviews.author: Jilly Beans

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Worked great drilling holes into an old fireplace to mount our 60 inch tv.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Siedlik

customer_reviews.title: Black and Decker quality at a bargain price.
customer_reviews.text: Great value for the price. Only needed one of the bits but the set only cost a little more. Nice case included
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Did the job but don't yet know how it will hold up
customer_reviews.author: F. Kline

customer_reviews.title: Not bad!
customer_reviews.text: The drill bits were strong and stable enough to provide me the assistance needed on my particular task. Well done Black and Decker!
customer_reviews.author: T. Austin

customer_reviews.title: Worked well to drill holes where other masonry bits failed.
customer_reviews.text: Worked well to drill holes where other masonry bits failed.
customer_reviews.author: darnett

customer_reviews.title: Cute packaging!
customer_reviews.text: What a darling little set. I bought it to drill holes in the bottom of porcelain and ceramic garden pots and other masonry type jobs. Very good price thru AMZN. And so nicely put together (like a mini suitcase) so that the drills will be secure and not lost.
customer_reviews.author: picky senior

customer_reviews.title: worked great on concrete wall
customer_reviews.text: I needed to drill holes in concrete garage walls so bought these. I only have a medium duty Hitachi drill but with these bits I was able to penetrate the concrete deep enough for anchors to be inserted so that I could install shelving.
customer_reviews.author: the toy cannon

customer_reviews.title: Not all bits are created equal.
customer_reviews.text: I've been generally happy with B&D gear... I have a fair amount of it, including a set of wood bits that've served me well for a decade. These, though... It took an *absurd* amount of time to get through a piece of ceramic tile with one of these--and I know it was absurd not only because it spanned multiple separate attempts, but because a Milwaukee bit in the same drill did the work in 1/10 the time.
customer_reviews.author: George L.

customer_reviews.title: Easily cut through strong masonry
customer_reviews.text: Strong drill bits. They easily cut through strong masonry, where other bits failed. The box is helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Not for wimps
customer_reviews.text: All the bits a guy needs. I would even give these To a Comedian so they could have great bits! Good solid strong bits!
customer_reviews.author: BillTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: I have a bigger bit from craftsman, goes through brick like it were butter. This one cannot even scape it.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberley

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: What can I say? Black & Decker quality, really well packaged and at a very reasonable price... Would definately purchase again...
customer_reviews.author: Keith H. Gaines

customer_reviews.title: Gave these masonry drills a three because have not used ...
customer_reviews.text: Gave these masonry drills a three because have not used them yet and they are rather short (5 in) so depth is limited and for my use they may be to short. I will be drilling through Rock and Cement so overall performance will be addressed at that time.
customer_reviews.author: Royce D. Tuckness

customer_reviews.title: Drill bits
customer_reviews.text: These are okay if you want masonry, I was looking for bits for my B & D rotary drill and these would not work in it
customer_reviews.author: brdancer

customer_reviews.title: Through Like Butter
customer_reviews.text: Perfect set of bits. I burned up a couple regular bits trying to install a shower curtain but these bits went through old shower tile and the concrete backing and steel mesh like butter.
customer_reviews.author: John Frantz

product_meta.title: BLACK+DECKER Masonry Drill Bit Set, 5-Piece (16748)
product_meta.description:
Black & Decker Bullet Masonry bits have a patented speed tip design that penetrates surfaces quickly, drilling up to 2 times faster than competitive drill bits. The innovative flute design removes material faster for easier drilling and more speed. This super efficient design drills up to 6 times more holes per battery charge with cordless drills. Commonly used for drilling anchor holes when installing flag poles, mail boxes and running electrical conduit and are idea in all masonry applications. 5 piece set includes: 3/16-Inch, 1/4-Inch, 5/16-Inch, 3/8-Inch and 1/2-Inch bits

BRAND STORY
By
feature_bullets: Patented speed tip design penetrates surfaces quickly, drilling up to 2 times faster than competitive drill bits
Innovative flute design removes material faster for easier drilling
Efficient design drills up to 6x more holes per battery charge with cordless drills
Commonly used for drilling anchor holes when installing flag poles, mail boxes and running electrical conduit

Includes: 3/16 x 4-Inch Rotary masonry bit (1), 1/4 x 4-Inch Rotary masonry bit (1), 5/16 x 4-Inch Rotary masonry bit (1), 3/8 x 4-Inch Rotary masonry bit (1), 1/2-inch x 4-Foot Rotary masonry bit (1)
